name: Droid Certification Test
description:
You are a droid in the making. You must complete a final test before  service. And that test has difficult strength challenges and extreme questions. Ready up, for this test is a SHOW on it's own.

Submitted For Beginners Circle Game Jam #4

You can restart through pause menu. Press TAB for help.

Special Thanks To:

Pune007 (https://pune007.itch.io/) For guiding me with a lot of stuff and  playtesting.

Brackeys, Jonas Tyroller , Code Monkey, Games Plus James and Boards To Bits Games for tutorials/game dev tips.

Thanks to Angrysmile for hosting the jam, and the community for being very inspiring.

Made Using:

Unity

Visual Studio Code

Piskel

Bosca Ceoil

Audio Lab
